description:
Running socks with minimal cushioning for sensitivity and comfort in close-fitting shoes.

  • Fabric manages moisture and breathability to keep your feet cool and comfortable
  • Firm support keeps feet going mile after mile
  • Midfoot arch band and y-heel keeps socks in place without bunching
  • Seamless toe for chafe-free comfort
  • Ultralight cushioning keeps feet comfortable without adding bulk
name: Swiftwick Aspire Two Running Socks - Unisex
